abstract: Veoh, the online video company backed by Time Warner and Michael D. Eisner among others, said on Wednesday that it had hired a former advertising executive at Yahoo as its new chief executive. The new chief, Steve Mitgang, will succeed the founder, Dmitry Shapiro, who will become chief innovation officer.
lead_paragraph: Veoh, the online video company backed by Time Warner and Michael D. Eisner among others, said on Wednesday that it had hired a former advertising executive at Yahoo as its new chief executive. The new chief, Steve Mitgang, will succeed the founder, Dmitry Shapiro, who will become chief innovation officer.

headline.main: Veoh Hires Ex-Yahoo Ad Executive as New C.E.O.
